alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 11 at 12:28PM AKST until November 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Yukon Delta Coast. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Water will inundate low lying areas. Large breaking waves will cause shoreline erosion and may impact fish racks and other structures near the beach. Some low lying roads and trails will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated water levels 2 to 4 feet above the normal high tide line are expected. Waves will push onshore, especially along south and west facing shores. Peak water levels will occur Monday night. Sustained southwest winds 25 to 35 mph Sunday afternoon will shift to the west Monday night. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Items on the beach should be moved to higher ground to prevent damage or being washed away. &&
